title: Potentials and limitations of microwave-assisted chemical recycling of fiber-reinforced composites from wind blades
content:

The forecasted increase in wind power capacity combined with the proximate end-of-life of existing infrastructures will pose a significant challenge. The main novel recycling technologies for WBCMs and its industrialization barriers are presented.
